DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study test hypothesis : 1 ) consumption beverage sweeten sucrose increase risk factor cardiovascular disease great extent naturally-sweetened fruit juice orange juice , 2 ) chronic psychological stress may augment adverse metabolic effect sugar intake . The study intervention consist 2-week 's consumption 25 % energy sugar provide either sucrose-sweetened beverage naturally-sweetened orange juice .
DOC.criteria: Body mass index 2835 Self report stable body weight past six month High stress participant : Perceived Stress Scores ( PSS ) ≥ 24 , presence predefined chronically stressful event assess Telephone screen question . ( IDS score inclusion criterion group , merely ruleout low stress participant ) . Low stress participant : PSS score ≤ 8 , Inventory Depressive Symptom ( IDS ) score ≤ 14 , absence predefined chronically stressful event assess telephone screen question . glucose intolerance Evidence liver disorder Evidence kidney disorder Evidence thyroid disorder Systolic blood pressure consistently 140mmHg diastolic blood pressure 90mmHg Triglycerides > 200mg/dl LDLC > 130mg/dl Hemoglobin < 8.5 g/dl pregnant lactate woman Current , prior ( within 12 month ) , anticipate use hypolipidemic antidiabetic agent Use Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors antihypertensive medication Any condition , opinion investigator , would put subject risk Strenuous exerciser surgery weight loss Diet exclusion : food allergy , special dietary restriction , habitual ingest > 2 alcoholic beverages/day
